PersonalStatement.text: Daniel Powers, born on 1964-04-20, is a Male based in Jasonton, Uruguay. He is Married and holds Cameroonian nationality. Currently working at Malone Inc.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Strong-Hill from 2008 to 2020.
Senior Data Analyst at Malone Inc, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Khoja Akhmet Yassawi International Kazakh-Turkish University
Master's in Engineering from Universität Potsdam

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
